Header: President Obama fires criticism at Donald Trump
Content: President Barack Obama had stated that the Republican nominee Donald Trump is unfit to be president and questioned as to why the republican party still supports the New York billionaire’s candidacy. “There has to come a point at which you say: ‘Enough’,” charged President Obama. Mr Trump has had many a criticism leveled at him and following his reaction to the speech at the Democratic National Convention by the parents of a dead US Muslim soldier, the New York real estate tycoon has come under more fire. Mr.Trump had turned his focus to two senior figures in his own party who have publicly criticized him and during an interview he refused to endorse House Speaker Paul Ryan and Senator John McCain, who are up for re-election in November. President Obama stated that even though there have been policy differences with previous Republican presidents and candidates he had never thought they could not function as president.
